product_name: MiiR Growler Insulated Water Bottle - 64 fl. oz.
long_description: The durable, outdoor-ready 64 oz. Miir Growler Insulated Water Bottle keeps beverages at their original temperature, so whether you're looking forward to hot soup or cool refreshment, it's just right. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps cold fluids cold for 24+ hours and hot fluids hot for 12+ hours. Flip-top opening includes a clamp system that prevents leaks and eliminates the hassle of a threaded screw top. The Miir Growler Insulated Water Bottle holds 64 fl. oz.
short_description: The durable, outdoor-ready 64 oz. Miir Growler Insulated Water Bottle keeps beverages at their original temperature, so whether you're looking forward to hot soup or cool refreshment, it's just right.
